Manchester City footballer Ilkay Gundogan has revealed he has married his model fiancée Sara Arfaoui, five months after they became engaged.

articles.author: Paul MacInnes
articles.title: NGO group says Fifa should pay £356m reparations to Qatar migrant workers - The Guardian
articles.description: A group of NGOs has said Fifa should pay reparations of at least £356m to migrant workers whose human rights have been compromised by the Qatar World Cup
articles.content:
Fifa should pay reparations of at least $440m (£356m) to migrant workers whose human rights have been compromised by the Qatar World Cup, a group of non-governmental organisations has said.

articles.title: Jake Daniels insists he is 'proud' to be Marvin Ekpiteta's Blackpool team-mate - Daily Mail
articles.description: Following Daniels' announcement, which had been greeted with widespread support, posts made by Ekpiteta from 2012 and 2013 containing homophobic tones were highlighted.
articles.content:

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: Chelsea: Thomas Tuchel confirms Barcelona-bound Andreas Christensen has pulled out of MULTIPLE games - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Dane, 26, who will join Barcelona this summer, took himself out of contention for the defeat by Liverpool hours before kick-off. Tuchel refused to reveal the defender's exact reasons.
